    #include<stdio.h>
    int a[10001],b[101],ch;
    void read(int *p)
    {
    *p=0;
    ch=getchar_unlocked();
    while(ch<'0' || ch>'9') ch=getchar_unlocked();
    while(ch>='0' && ch<='9')
    {
    *p=(*p<<3)+(*p<<1)+ch-48;
    ch=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    }
    int main()
    {
    int i,n,q,x,y,cnt=0;
    read(&n);
    read(&q);
    for(i=1;i<=n;++i) read(&a[i]);
    while(q--)
    {
    read(&x);read(&y);
    for(int j=x;j<=y;++j) b[a[j]]++;
    for(int j=x;j<=y;++j)if(b[a[j]]>0) {cnt++;b[a[j]]=0;}
    printf("%d\n",cnt);cnt=0;
    }
    }
